external_references.description: Microsoft Threat Intelligence. (2023, May 24). Volt Typhoon targets US critical infrastructure with living-off-the-land techniques. Retrieved July 27, 2023.

description: [Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) has used the built-in [netsh](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0108) `port proxy` command to create proxies on compromised systems to facilitate access.(Citation: Microsoft Volt Typhoon May 2023)
